Welcome to howtohaptic! A Living Handbook of Haptic Experience Design Oliver Schneider 2020-05-14 Chapter 1 Introduction Welcome to howtohaptic! This is a living handbook for designers, researchers, and hapticians of all flavours to quickly reference material related to haptic experience design. This handbook is currently under development. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the author, Oliver Schneider. 1.1 What is haptic Haptic technology is any technology that engages the sense of touch. It could be vibrations in your smartphone or video game controller (Vibrotactile Technology, ??, or a robot arm that you push against for physiotherapy (force-feedback, ??). (Chapter 2) tells you what the value of haptics is - why is it important to know how to design for it What is Haptic Sense? (Chapter 3) gives a brief overview of the sense of touch, with links to references What is Haptic Tech? (Chapter 4) gives a brief overview of the wide array of haptic technologies, organized into the common groupings How to Haptic (Chapter 5)gives a primer on designing for haptic senses and technologies. How to Multisensory (Chapter 6) expands the discussion to multisensory design - how to work with vision, audio, and olfactory feedback.
